name: Beach Blanket - Wildcat
description:
::BEACH BLANKET :: 
Measures approx. 66in x 47in 
Black fringe trim
100% cotton

WASH IN COLD WATER & HANG DRY BEFORE USING
COLORS MAY RUN DUE TO DYING TECHNIQUES
DO NOT MIX WITH LIGHT COLORS


All items are hand-made with love and one-of-a-kind. Since all items are hand-made. I may produce several pieces of the same style and print, however no one piece is exactly the same as another. Prints and pattern positioning vary, making each piece unique.

LŌLIʻI SWIMWEAR 
Hand-made by Remy Hirai on O'ahu, Hawai'i

- - -

ALL SALES FINAL ON ACCESSORIES
